pkgmetadata.longdescription: Econometric Analysis of Explosive Time Series // Testing for and dating periods of explosive dynamics (exuberance) in time series using the univariate and panel recursive unit root tests proposed by Phillips et al. (2015) doi:10.1111/iere.12132 and Pavlidis et al. (2016) doi:10.1007/s11146-015-9531-2. The recursive least-squares algorithm utilizes the matrix inversion lemma to avoid matrix inversion which results in significant speed improvements. Simulation of a variety of periodically- collapsing bubble processes.
